duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive, store, and distribute material and products within the distribution center.
Read production schedule, customer order, work order, shipping order, and/or requisition to determine items to be moved or distributed.
Convey materials and items from receiving or production areas to storage or to other designated areas.
Sort and store perishable goods in refrigerated rooms.
Record, put away, and rotate product, and use computer and/or Radio Frequency Unit to record and track product.
Maintain safe work practices and safeguards of confidential company information.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required.
